translator_notes: This page recommends complementary books from the same publisher
Sarah Lacy's book is likely 'Brilliant, Crazy, Cocky' (2011) about tech entrepreneurs
The second book title uses 'ботаники' (botanists/nerds) - echoing the chapter 1 title theme
